main event: A sighting of unknown lights in the sky over Idaho Falls on December 15, 1953.
interesting points: The object had an oval clear white center that appeared brighter than surrounding lights,It was not flickering but steady, moving straight and level before disappearing, The observer used field glasses to make out individual lights, No aircraft position lights were observed, The conclusion of the report suggested possible aircraft lights on final approach.
sighted object: seven lights with a brighter central light
witness description: guard captain and an employee at a chemical processing plant
